DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the value of measuring cervical length as a predictor of vaginal birth after induction of labor with prostaglandins in pregnancies with 41 weeks of gestation.
DOC.brief_title: Cervical Length Pre-induction as a Tool to Predict Vaginal Birth
DOC.criteria: 41 weeks or more of gestational age Cervical length measured by a FMF certified physician Any condition that could interfere with a possible vaginal birth (previous cesarean section, hypertensive disorders of pregnancies).
